The article shares how to scan MRZ in an Oracle APEX application using Dynamsoft Label Recognizer to extract info from passports, ID cards, etc.
本文介绍了如何编写一个插件来使用Dynamsoft Label Recognizer在Oracle APEX应用程序中扫描MRZ，从护照、身份证等文档中提取信息。
The article shares how to scan MRZ in an Oracle APEX application using Dynamsoft Label Recognizer to extract info from passports, ID cards, etc.
/C:/Users/admin/Desktop/codepool/_blogs/OCR/oracle-apex-mrz-scanner.md
./img/2024/07/oracle-apex/mrzscanner.jpg
./img/2024/07/oracle-apex/mrzscanner.jpg
/C:/Users/admin/Desktop/codepool/_blogs/OCR/oracle-apex-mrz-scanner.md

MRZ stands for machine-readable zone, which is usually at the bottom of the identity page at the beginning of a passport or ID card.<x1/>^wiki<x2/> It can be read by a computing device with a camera to get information like document type, name, document number, nationality, date of birth, sex, and document expiration date.
MRZ（机器可读区域），通常位于护照或身份证的底部。<x1/>^ wiki<x2/>它可以通过带有摄像头的计算设备进行读取，以获取文件类型、姓名、编号、国籍、出生日期、性别和到期日期等信息。

MRZ stands for machine-readable zone, which is usually at the bottom of the identity page at the beginning of a passport or ID card.<x1/>^wiki<x2/> It can be read by a computing device with a camera to get information like document type, name, document number, nationality, date of birth, sex, and document expiration date.
/C:/Users/admin/Desktop/codepool/_blogs/OCR/oracle-apex-mrz-scanner.md
Oracle APEX is a low-code platform for building web applications.
Oracle APEX是一个用于构建Web应用程序的低代码平台。
Oracle APEX is a low-code platform for building web applications.
/C:/Users/admin/Desktop/codepool/_blogs/OCR/oracle-apex-mrz-scanner.md

在本文中，我们将编写一个MRZ扫描插件，以便我们可以在Oracle APEX应用程序中通过摄像头扫描MRZ。
In this article, we are going to build an MRZ scanner plugin so that we can scan MRZ from cameras in an Oracle APEX application.
